Method Detail

run

public void run()
Main execution of odometry correction. The odometer will only be corrected when the orientation of the robot is around 0, 90, 180, or 270 degrees. This should prevent lines read during turning from affecting the odometer

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

calculateThetaError

public void calculateThetaError()
Modifies the thetaError attribute but ONLY at certain times. Line readings will only be accepted if they are within a certain time threshold.

calculatePositionError

public void calculatePositionError()
Modified the x and y position based on orientation and proximity to closest grid line

compareAverageWithCurrent

public java.lang.Boolean compareAverageWithCurrent(int[] array,
                                                   ColorSensor sens)
Compares the average of a list of values with a new value

Parameters:
array - The list of values that the average will be calculated from
sens - The sensor whose reading will be compared to the list of values
Returns:
True if the comparison implies that a line has been read

fillWindows

public void fillWindows()
Fills the base light value arrays with wood-colored readings

public void updateWindow()
